Room.Name: Evenborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You have reached the corner of Evenborough Lane at the Lithium Inlet.
Room.LongDescription: Evenborough Way makes a sharp turn to the north and east to avoid the Lithium Inlet to the south. The small area of land between the inlet and the road is being used as a nightclub by some of the discouraged students from Iilandi University. A dirt path leads south towards the inlet and the nightclub.
